message.body: Hey gabi. Do you want to ask dove about playing tonight? Do you think he'd be a better option than colin?
Colin usually works on saturday nights, so ill call dov
Dov is in, do we have any hords tonight?
I thought you meant like mongols. I haven't invited anyone, no. Unless you have someone in mind let's just play as a trio.
Well hopefully we will have some hoards in the audience, could you bring dov some charts?
Yeah i will. See you in a bit.
